body_html: @gchanan We import Pytorch's autogpu. The equivalent is there if you use cudaSetDevice. The functionality of doing an op for tensors on a different GPU than you are on seems unspecified, and will current error out according to @ezyang, whereas if I'm writing a model, I'd rather probably it be one of the latter two options.
